ComicInfo.Summary:
Secret of the Dead Man's Diary: Eliot gets his revenge on Curt Fowler, who must find the clue to avoid his fate before he is killed.
Don't Monkey with Murder: The villain kidnaps the monkey god of a group of local worshipers.
Dead Heat: A murderer picks the wrong place to hide.
The Garden of Death!: A physician uses his knowledge of exotic plants to become a poisoner for hire.
Midnight Muzak: Jason Parr invents a new germ warfare technique that makes the subjects go mad at the slightest sound.
The Beautiful and the Damned: Nora tries to force her husband to create a formula that will keep her forever young.
Flame of Death: Nina uses science to outsmart a witch doctor.
Give a Great Big Smile to Satan: Martin and Janice's newborn baby is fought over by two covens, one good and one evil.
Moonlight and Mayhem!: Lenore becomes suspicious of her husband who claims to be working nights.
ComicInfo.Tags: India,Mildred,Africa,Mordred,Abel,The House of Secrets,The Three Witches,Cynthia
